statements: SELECT * FROM GenderPayGapData WHERE avg_salary > 50000
SELECT gender, industry, avg_salary FROM GenderPayGapData WHERE region = 'California'
SELECT industry, region, gender, avg_salary FROM GenderPayGapData ORDER BY avg_salary DESC
SELECT DISTINCT industry FROM GenderPayGapData
SELECT * FROM GenderPayGapData WHERE region = 'New York' AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM GenderPayGapData WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY avg_salary DESC;
SELECT industry, region, avg_salary FROM GenderPayGapData WHERE region = 'North' ORDER BY avg_salary ASC;
SELECT industry, gender, avg_salary FROM GenderPayGapData WHERE industry LIKE '%Tech%' AND avg_salary > 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM GenderPayGapData ORDER BY region;
SELECT industry, gender, MAX(avg_salary) AS highest_salary FROM GenderPayGapData GROUP BY industry, gender HAVING MAX(avg_salary) > 80000;
SELECT industry_name, average_male_salary, average_female_salary FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry;
SELECT region_name, male_employees_count, female_employees_count, median_male_salary, median_female_salary FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region;
SELECT * FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry WHERE average_male_salary > average_female_salary;
SELECT industry_name, average_male_salary, average_female_salary FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry ORDER BY average_male_salary DESC;
SELECT region_name, male_employees_count, female_employees_count, median_male_salary, median_female_salary FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT industry_name, average_male_salary, average_female_salary FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry ORDER BY average_male_salary DESC, industry_name;
SELECT region_name, male_employees_count, female_employees_count FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region WHERE male_employees_count > female_employees_count ORDER BY male_employees_count DESC;
SELECT industry_name, average_male_salary, average_female_salary FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry WHERE industry_name LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY industry_name;
SELECT * FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region WHERE median_male_salary > median_female_salary;

SELECT industry_name, average_male_salary, average_female_salary FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry WHERE average_male_salary > average_female_salary ORDER BY average_male_salary - average_female_salary DESC, industry_name;
SELECT * FROM industry_pay_gap_data ORDER BY industry_name ASC;
SELECT industry_name, avg_pay_gap FROM industry_pay_gap_data WHERE avg_pay_gap > 1000;
SELECT industry_name, AVG(avg_pay_gap) AS avg_pay_gap FROM industry_pay_gap_data GROUP BY industry_name;
SELECT * FROM regional_pay_gap_data WHERE region_name = 'East';
SELECT company_name, pay_gap FROM company_pay_gap_data ORDER BY pay_gap DESC;
SELECT * FROM industry_pay_gap_data ORDER BY industry_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT industry_name, avg_pay_gap FROM industry_pay_gap_data WHERE avg_pay_gap > 0 ORDER BY avg_pay_gap DESC;
SELECT company_name, pay_gap FROM company_pay_gap_data WHERE pay_gap > 0 ORDER BY pay_gap DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, pay_gap, industry_name FROM company_pay_gap_data JOIN industry_pay_gap_data ON company_pay_gap_data.industry_id = industry_pay_gap_data.industry_id ORDER BY pay_gap ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT region_name, AVG(avg_pay_gap) AS average_gap FROM regional_pay_gap_data GROUP BY region_name HAVING AVG(avg_pay_gap) > 0 ORDER BY average_gap DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry;
SELECT industry_name, gender, pay_gap FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry ORDER BY pay_gap DESC;
SELECT industry_name, average_salary FROM industry_data WHERE number_of_employees > 5000;
SELECT region_name, SUM(pay_gap) AS total_pay_gap FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT * FROM pay_gap_statistics WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY pay_gap ASC;
SELECT industry_name, AVG(average_salary) AS avg_salary FROM industry_data GROUP BY industry_name ORDER BY avg_salary DESC;
SELECT industry_name, number_of_employees FROM industry_data WHERE number_of_employees > 10000 ORDER BY number_of_employees ASC;
SELECT region_name, gender, AVG(pay_gap) AS avg_pay_gap FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region GROUP BY region_name, gender HAVING AVG(pay_gap) > 10.00 ORDER BY avg_pay_gap DESC;
SELECT * FROM pay_gap_statistics WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY pay_gap DESC, industry_id ASC;
SELECT industry_name, region_name, gender, pay_gap FROM gender_pay_gap_by_industry WHERE industry_id > 5 ORDER BY industry_name ASC, pay_gap DESC;
SELECT * FROM gender_stats;
SELECT industry, pay_gap FROM gender_stats WHERE region = 'North' ORDER BY pay_gap DESC;
SELECT industry, gender, AVG(pay_gap) AS avg_pay_gap FROM gender_stats GROUP BY industry, gender;
SELECT * FROM employee_data WHERE salary > 50000 AND region_id = 2 ORDER BY salary DESC;

SELECT employee_name, industry_name, region_name, salary FROM employee_data INNER JOIN industry_data ON employee_data.industry_id = industry_data.id INNER JOIN region_data ON employee_data.region_id = region_data.id WHERE industry_name = 'Tech' AND region_code = 1 ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT * FROM gender_stats WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT industry, region, pay_gap FROM gender_stats ORDER BY pay_gap DESC;
SELECT industry_name, region_name, gender, salary FROM employee_data WHERE salary > 50000;

SELECT initiative_name, budget, industry_name, region_name FROM advocacy_efforts JOIN industry_data ON advocacy_efforts.industry_id = industry_data.id JOIN region_data ON advocacy_efforts.region_id = region_data.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM employee_data WHERE region_id = 2;
